title: Visit to Paracas, Ballestas Islands and Huacachina
description: We will carry out all our tourist tour with our tourist mobilities with reclining seats, music and with a bilingual guide who will accompany you throughout the trip, providing a special service until your return from the starting point or the hotel. You and your companions will live an unforgettable adventure with all our Peruvian tradition.
all_descriptions: We will carry out all our tourist tour with our tourist mobilities with reclining seats, music and with a bilingual guide who will accompany you throughout the trip, providing a special service until your return from the starting point or the hotel. You and your companions will live an unforgettable adventure with all our Peruvian tradition.

ItineraryThis is a typical itinerary for this productStop At:Paracas, Paracas, Ica RegionOur first point will be the Paracas spa where we will go to the Puerto de la Marina Turística de Paracas where we will embark on modern yachts or luxury motor gliders.Duration: 1 hourStop At:Islas Ballestas, Paracas 11660 PeruIn modern gliders we will begin our adventure out to sea to go to the Ballestas Islands, a place where Sea Lions, Humboldt Penguins and various guano birds live. We will visit the surroundings of the island and we will also observe the El Candelabro geoglyph and its mysterious creationDuration: 2 hoursStop At:Pisco Nietto, Bodega Fundo Tres Esquinas, s/n, Ica PeruAfter our marine adventure we will go to the farms of Ica where we will visit the famous Pisco Nietto Winery, where our Peruvian flag Pisco drink is prepared.
An expert worker will show us their entire production process and we will be able to taste their different products such as Wine, Macerates, Pisco and Pisco Creams in the style and animation of the winemakers themselves.Duration: 3 hoursStop At:Oasis Huacachina, Ica 11000 PeruWe will visit the oasis of America the Huacachina lagoon located in the dunes of Ica. We will enjoy its warm and quiet place.
In this place we can also live an adventure tour in the dunes with the tubulars or sand buggies and slide on a board on sand sandboard (optional tour)Duration: 3 hoursStop At:Chincha Alta, Chincha Alta, Ica RegionOur last tourist stop will be at the Racimo de Uva Vitivinícola, a place where we will enjoy the show and dance of Afro-Peruvian customs. We will find all our culture, traditions and Peruvian gastronomy in this place. Those who like will be able to participate in the contests and prizes offered by this cozy place.Duration: 2 hours

⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
We did the tour of Ballestas Islands and Huacachina, and it was an excellent experience from start to finish. Everything was very well organized, perfect times and every detail taken care of. Our guide, Paul, made all the difference: super friendly, attentive and knowledgeable. He explained everything clearly and entertainingly, always willing to answer questions and make sure everyone enjoyed themselves to the fullest. I recommend this tour 100%!

⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
We took Islas Ballestas and Huacachina tour and it was excellent from start to finish. Everything was very well organized, perfectly timed, and every detail was taken care of. Our guide, Paul, made all the difference: super friendly, attentive, and extremely knowledgeable. I explained everything clearly and in an engaging way, always ready to answer questions and make sure everyone was having the best experience. I highly recommend this tour 100%!
